backend/main.mo: Defines core actor types and state for user profiles, testimonies, scripture entries, reflections, feed items, and access-controlled CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata for hero‑image asset validation and update requirements with associated components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides high‑level summaries of major frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode overrides, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting favicon assets, metadata, and the root mount for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack router, query client, layout, and routes for onboarding, feed, testimony, scripture, reflections, evangelism pages, and faith resources.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Landing/authentication gate with hero image, login CTA, fallback placeholder, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/evangelism/Evang: CTA card guiding users to sign in, complete onboarding, or navigate to the feed based on authentication state.
Layout wrapper for evangelism pages with optional hero image, title, subtitle, and content styling.
frontend/src/components/feed/AddCommentF: Form for submitting comments or prayer requests, handling references, validation, and API submission.
frontend/src/components/feed/AgentReplyC: Displays an AI agent’s reply with content, scripture references, and timestamp.
frontend/src/components/feed/AuthorIdent: Shows the author’s identity or a system agent badge based on the principal.
frontend/src/components/feed/CommentsThr: Dialog showing a scrollable comments thread with support for agent replies and adding new comments.
frontend/src/components/feed/CreatePostC: Composer card for creating new posts with optional references and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/feed/FeedItemCar: Renders a feed item card for scripture, discernment, or testimony entries with navigation.
frontend/src/components/feed/FollowButto: Follow/unfollow button with state handling, disabled for self or system agent.
frontend/src/components/feed/ReactionBar: Like/reaction control allowing users to add or remove a heart reaction.
frontend/src/components/feed/RepostButto: Button to repost an item to the user’s feed with loading and success handling.
frontend/src/components/feed/UnifiedFeed: Renders a feed item card with icons, author info, timestamps, and actions like follow, reactions, and comments.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Provides the main header with navigation buttons, evangelism links, and authentication actions.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps the app with a header, main content container, and footer layout.
frontend/src/constants/brand.ts: Defines paths for logo and brand assets along with the brand name constant.
frontend/src/hooks/queryKeys.ts: Centralizes React Query cache keys for user profiles, feeds, reactions, and follow states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvangelismScrollTo: Scrolls to top on specific evangelism-related routes using router path detection.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state, login, and logout logic using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend calls in React Query hooks for profiles, posts, feeds, reactions, and comments.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, theme variables, typography, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AssuranceNextStepsPag: Renders the Assurance & Next Steps page using evangelism content, showing growth steps, scripture badges, navigation links, and a CTA card.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectPage.tsx: Displays the Connect page with community-oriented faith sections, scripture references, navigation links, and a CTA card.
frontend/src/pages/DailyFeedPage.tsx: Fetches and displays unified social posts and interleaved legacy feed items with loading, error handling, tabs, and optional post creation.
frontend/src/pages/DiscernmentDetailPage: Shows details for a single discernment reflection, including scripture references, labels, and navigation back to the feed.
frontend/src/pages/evangelism/topics-que: Generic shell component for individual topic pages, rendering sections, references, a back link, and a CTA card.
Loads the 'how-to-read-the-bible' topic and renders it through TopicPageShell.
Loads the 'how-to-share-your-faith' topic and renders it via TopicPageShell.
Loads the 'what-happens-after-death' topic and renders it through TopicPageShell.
Loads the 'what-is-baptism' topic and displays it using TopicPageShell.
Loads the 'what-is-faith' topic and renders it through TopicPageShell.
Loads the 'what-is-prayer' topic and displays it via TopicPageShell.
Loads the 'what-is-repentance' topic and renders it through TopicPageShell.
Loads the 'what-is-salvation' topic and displays it using TopicPageShell.
Loads the 'what-is-sin' topic and renders it through TopicPageShell.
Loads the 'what-is-the-church' topic and displays it via TopicPageShell.
Loads the 'what-is-the-gospel' topic and renders it through TopicPageShell.
Loads the 'who-is-god' topic and displays it via TopicPageShell.
Loads the 'why-did-jesus-die' topic and renders it through TopicPageShell.
frontend/src/pages/evangelismContent.ts: Defines structured evangelism content for pages like Peace With God and Why Jesus, including sections, references, and framing text.
frontend/src/pages/FaithResourcesPage.ts: Provides categorized links to foundational and growth-oriented faith resources using cards and icon headers.
frontend/src/pages/HowToBeginPage.tsx: Presents step-by-step guidance for beginning faith in Christ with scripture badges, a sample prayer, next-step links, and a CTA card.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Collects user profile details (name, life situation, spiritual needs) and saves them before navigating to the feed.
frontend/src/pages/PeaceWithGodPage.tsx: Displays gospel-focused content with sections, scripture references, and links to related evangelism topics.
frontend/src/pages/peaceWithGodStepsCont: Provides step-by-step evangelism content and scripture references for the Peace With God framework.
frontend/src/pages/PeaceWithGodStepsIntr: Introduces a four-step journey to peace with God and links to the full steps page, with brief summaries of each step.
frontend/src/pages/PeaceWithGodStepsLong: Provides the full multi-step gospel explanation with detailed text, scriptures, response steps, and a sample prayer.
frontend/src/pages/ScriptureDetailPage.t: Shows a detailed view of a selected scripture from the daily feed, including text, reflection, and labels.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitTestimonyPage.t: Allows users to submit testimonies with optional scripture references and displays a confirmation after submission.
frontend/src/pages/topicsQuestionsConten: Defines the TopicContent interface and provides an array of structured theological Q&A content used for topic-based pages.
frontend/src/pages/TopicsQuestionsIndexP: Renders the Topics & Questions index page, mapping topic slugs to routes and listing topic cards with titles and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/WhyJesusPage.tsx: Displays the 'Why Jesus?' evangelism page using structured content, scripture references, navigation links, and a CTA card.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helper functions to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL and sessionStorage parameters, including persistence logic.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend build.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature states, and requirements regarding updating and managing the landing-page hero image.
